match: "The Ballad of the Green Berets" is a patriotic song in the ballad style about the Green Berets, an elite special force in the U.S. Army.

Bjorn Kristian Ulvaeus (; born 25 April 1945) is a Swedish songwriter, composer, musician, writer, producer, a former member of the Swedish musical group ABBA (197283), and co-composer of the musicals "Chess", "Kristina fran Duvemala", and "Mamma Mia!".
